channel.title: Command help
channel.description: ok how do you make a tele command and where do you put it? Also, how do you make it so that the pickup command works for the owner?

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Element_SoftwareTM Element SoftwareTM
item.description:
@Element_SoftwareTM wrote:

You have to put this command, in “CLIENT JAVA”…
Put it after this:

public void customCommand(String command) { actionAmount++;

} if (command.startsWith("NAME OF COMMAND")) { sendMessage("TYPE WHEN YOU TELLY."); teleportToX = COORD; teleportToY = COORD; } [br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2007, 08:31:27 PM[/size][hr]Add this is “CLIENT JAVA”…

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Pimp") || playerRights >= 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10");
